text: Mark Brnovich (born 1966) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the 26th Attorney General of Arizona from 2015 to 2023. He is a member of the Republican Party. Brnovich was an unsuccessful candidate for the Republican nomination for U.S. Senator in the 2022 election. Brnovich is married to Susan Brnovich, a United States district judge. In March 2025, President Donald Trump nominated Brnovich as the next United States Ambassador to Serbia. ==References== ==Other websites== *Campaign website *Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich official state government site * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona attorneys general Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Lawyers from Detroit Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark Brnovich
